name: GOLDBOY
description:
GOLDBOY is a short 2D action-precision-platformer game. Assume the role of a plebian named "Goldboy" who lives a monotonous life in the slums of the giant brick Kingdom, that towers over the surrounding forest.

There are rumors of a hidden and corrupt underworld beneath the kingdom, where sunlight is vacant, faces appear in the walls, and up is down and down is up! 

Are these rumors true? Only you can find out!

  • Fast-paced gameplay
  • Old-school pixelated graphics
  • Progressively challenging puzzles as you get further in the game
